name: KloudStores Shopping Cart Plugin
author: kloudstores

sections.description:
This plugin will create a store for your on KloudStores (kloudstores.com) and also link it in your blog as a separate page. After the store is created you can manage it at https://admin.kloudstores.com

KloudStores is a hosted shopping cart solution which allows you to easily customize and manage your online store. Get product views and order information in real-time.

For more information, check out www.kloudstores.com

The created online store includes features as:

  • Product inventory and management
  • Order management
  • Reports
  • Discount codes and shipping management
  • Multiple themes and an advanced theme editor
  • Facebook integration
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire kloudstores folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Easily add an online shopping cart to your blog. This plugin will create a store for you and automatically link it in your blog.
